snippet: Four people, most likely employees of Iran’s nuclear program, were suspected of planning to sabotage one of its nuclear sites, an official told reporters.
abstract: Iranian authorities arrest four people suspected of planning to sabotage one of country’s nuclear sites; say four are most likely employees of country's nuclear program, but suggest connection to foreign sabotage plots.
lead_paragraph: Four people, most likely employees of Iran’s nuclear program, were suspected of planning to sabotage one of its nuclear sites, an official told reporters.

headline.main: 4 Held in Iran Nuclear Site Plot
headline.print_headline: 4 Held in Iran Nuclear Site Plot
